sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"标志，象征，符号"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: symbol, badge, sign, signal, mark, token, attribute, emblem
means: symbol ： 指作象征或表达某种深邃意蕴的特殊事物。
badge ： 一般指金属证章或写有姓名的带状标志物。
sign ： 普通用词，指人们公认事物的记号，也可指某种情况的征兆。
signal ： 指为某一目的而有意发出的信号。
mark ： 普通用词，含义广泛。既可指方便于辨认而有意做的标记，又可指自然形成的标记或有别于他事物的特征。
token ： 语气庄重，指礼品、纪念物等作为表示友谊、爱情等的象征或标志。
attribute ： 指人或物及其地位、属性的象征。
emblem ： 指选定象征一个国家、民族或家庭等的图案或实物。

sentence.Network_en: You described her as the token woman on the shortlist.
sentence.Network_cn: 你把她形容为入围名单上象征性的女性人选。

sentence.Network_en: Don't forget to clip the token and stick it on your card.
sentence.Network_cn: 别忘了剪下标志，贴到你的卡上。

sentence.Network_en: By the same token , the everlasting interdependence is actually an everlasting love.
sentence.Network_cn: 正如, 永远的依存,也是永远的爱.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 标记由调用者供给GSS-API接口调用的数据，转换成特定于机制格式的标记（Token）。GSS-API调用者接收这些由它的本地GSS-AP…
令牌传递（token passing）方式，将称为令牌（token）的包在线路中循环传递，用这个令牌来控制数据的发生权，只有拥有令牌的工 …
...开发出来的，这就已经是最大的先天优势了，它的原理是记号(token)会从一个点依序传送至下个点，因此电脑可以先后顺序依次传 …
有代币（Token）的状况下只怕除外跟返回手牌！（这也是为何七大厨具中的强脱＆次元幽闭还是有高度价值的缘故）即使发动后不能 …

list.abs: 采用令牌桶（Token Bucket）对流量的规格进行评估。 令牌桶可以看作是一个存放一定数量令牌的容器。

KINAZ -... ... KINAZ - Lonely 寂寞故事系列~寂寞温 KINAZ - Love token 恋爱信物系列~ KINAZ - Singing 爱情快乐颂系列~甜橘.

phrase.cizu_name: by the same (或 that 或 this) token

jx.jx_en_mean: in the same way or for the same reason

lj.lj_ly: there was little evidence to substantiate the gossip and, by the same token, there was little to disprove it.
lj.lj_ls: 没有什么证据来证实这则小道消息，同样也没有证据来反驳它。

lj.lj_ly: a ring given in token of love.
lj.lj_ls: 一只象征爱情而给的戒指

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English tāc(e)n, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch teken and German Zeichen, also to teach

entry.def: You use token to describe things or actions which are small or unimportant but are meant to show particular intentions or feelings which may not be sincere.

example.ex: The announcement was welcomed as a step in the right direction, but was widely seen as a token gesture...
example.tran: 该公告被认为是向正确方向迈进的一步，因而受到欢迎，但也被普遍看作是一种象征性的姿态。

example.ex: Miners have staged a two-hour token stoppage to demand better pay and conditions…
example.tran: 矿工们举行了两小时的象征性停工，以要求提高工资和改善工作条件。

entry.def: A token is a piece of paper or card that can be exchanged for goods, either in a particular shop or as part of a special offer.

example.tran: 价值 10 英镑的购书券

example.ex: Here is the fifth token towards our offer. You need six of these tokens.
example.tran: 这是第 5 张礼券，你需要 6 张才能享受我们的特价。

entry.def: A token is a round flat piece of metal or plastic that is sometimes used instead of money.

example.ex: Some of the older telephones still only accept tokens.
example.tran: 一些较老式的电话机仍然只收代币。

entry.def: If you give something to a person or do something for them as a token of your feelings, you give it or do it as a way of expressing those feelings.

example.ex: He kept sending gifts and assured her that they were merely small tokens of his appreciation…
example.tran: 他不断送她礼物，并向她保证说这些只是为了略表谢意。

example.ex: As a token of goodwill, I'm going to write another letter.
example.tran: 为了证明我的善意，我打算再写一封信。

entry.tran: 同样地;由于同样的原因
entry.def: You use by the same token to introduce a statement that you think is true for the same reasons that were given for a previous statement.

example.ex: If you give up exercise, your muscles shrink and fat increases. By the same token, if you expend more energy you will lose fat.
example.tran: 停止锻炼会使肌肉萎缩、脂肪增加。同样，如果花更多的精力锻炼，就会减掉脂肪。

means.word_mean: 1. an individual instance of a type of symbol;
2. a metal or plastic disk that can be used (as a substitute for coins) in slot machines
1. insignificantly small; a matter of form only (`tokenish' is informal);

auth_sentence.content: Its difficulty was a token of its transformational powers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its difficulty was a token of its transformational powers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its difficulty was a token of its transformational powers.

auth_sentence.content: Token Dominican force participates in the US invasion of Grenada.
auth_sentence.res_content: Token Dominican force participates in the US invasion of Grenada.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Token Dominican force participates in the US invasion of Grenada.

auth_sentence.content: By the same token its non-existence should be treated likewise.
auth_sentence.res_content: By the same token its non-existence should be treated likewise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By the same token its non-existence should be treated likewise.

sentences.en: The council gives old people free tokens.
sentences.cn: 委员会发给老年人免费代金券。

jushi.chinese: 我得到了价值50美元的购物券。

jushi.english: He gave his wife a ring as a token of his love.
jushi.chinese: 他给他妻子一枚戒指，作为爱情的象征。
